ygData.subject: Re: Question of Aesthetics
ygData.msgSnippet: How does it compare framerate wise with the summoning animation?  I saw three people die in Kelethin last nite because they were running across a bridge, hit
ygData.messageBody:
How does it compare framerate wise with the summoning animation? I saw
three people die in Kelethin last nite because they were running across a
bridge, hit the are of summoning animation where a guy was standing right at
the end of a bridge summoning, turned and fell off. I barely avoided the
same fate moments before. I was running along, hit the animation area
(Where it filled the screen) and slowed to about 50% speed, thru my timing
on the turn way off. Guess that'll teach me to use selo with Drum on the
2nd level of Kelethin!

Kitasi on E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: J.M. Capozzi [mailto:croak63@...]
Sent: Friday, June 25, 1999 9:49 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Question of Aesthetics


From: "J.M. Capozzi" <croak63@...>

True.

It gets pretty gaudy being a bard. White dots, vortexes, sparkles, etc.
Also gets pretty rough on the framerate. Most folks that group often with a
bard, and even the bard, tend to turn Particles to LOW or OFF after a while.


----- Original Message -----
From: Benny Hung <benny@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, June 25, 1999 9:48 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Question of Aesthetics


>From: Benny Hung <benny@...>
>
>On Fri, 25 Jun 1999, Brian Dickens wrote:
>> From: Brian Dickens <briandickens@...>
>>
>> When does Selo's start to look different?
>
>
>Level 24, all songs/spells get extra sparkles. Also rumor has it that
>level 39 is another new song effect level.
>
